title: Teenage sisters confess to killing 'rapist paedophile' dad with hammer and knife
text:

Three teenage sisters were caught on camera confessing to murdering their dad who allegedly sexually abused them.

The girls face murder charges in a high-profile Russian case over the killing of their “controlling paedophile father”, Mikhail Khachaturyan, 57.

Krestina, Angelina and Maria - aged 19, 18 and 17 when he was killed with his hunting knife and a hammer - claim they acted in self-defence after years of bullying and abuse.

But in a critical video of their interrogation released by relatives who dispute their innocence, they admit their father was sedated and sitting in an armchair and not directly threatening them when they took his life.

Earlier Maria claimed in a recorded emergency services audio call moments after the death that they killed their father after he attacked them with a knife.

In the police video at the crime scene, their family flat, Maria said: “He was sitting in this armchair, in that corner.

“Me and Angelina approached from the back, she had a hammer, I had a knife.”

Angelina said she had been preparing food their their divorced father with whom they lived.

“Then we said - let's try, take a risk,” said Angelina.

(Image: east2west news)

(Image: east2west news)

“And we asked our eldest sister, so she helped us and sprayed pepper spray.

“I was on the left, Maria on the right.

“She first stabbed him with the knife. He woke up.

“Then I hit him with the hammer. Twice."

Then he came round and pulled himself up asking: 'What's going on?’"

(Image: Rossiya 1/east2west news)

A detective asked: “He did not understand what is going on?” Angelina agreed.

In the leaked audio of the call, Maria had said that her father was “under the influence of drugs” when he was killed.

“He has sedative pills, but he took a lot of them,” she said.

Pretending to be one of her elder sisters wile making the emergency call, Maria was asked: “He attacked you with a knife?”

“Yes,” she sobbed. The emergency services operator asked: “And which of you stabbed him?”

“Me,” she cried.

In other testimony Maria said: "We approached from the back and attacked.

“Simultaneously. I stabbed him in his neck from the back.

(Image: east2west news)

(Image: 360 TV/east2west news)

“From the side Angelina hit him with the hammer, several times on his head.

“It seems that I stabbed him twice in the neck and Angelina hit him twice with the hammer.

“He immediately stood up. Like jumped.

“He was saying something unclear, like ‘I need to wash my face’.”

Later he was found to have been stabbed through the heart with his hunting knife.

(Image: east2west news)

Angelina was also quoted as claiming that the eldest sister had urged her siblings not to kill.

"Krestina was trying to persuade us, pleading 'do not do this',” she said.

The shocking case has transfixed Russians amid defence demands that the sisters had been tortured and raped by their father so they could not be held responsible for their actions.

Some relatives claim their father was not the ogre they have claimed.

Two of the three, Krestina and Angelina, could be jailed for between eight and 20 years.

(Image: east2west news)

A court has already ruled that Maria, now 18, did not understand her actions when she was part of the alleged “group” conspiracy kill their father.

As a result Maria will not face jail whatever the verdict.

After the attack, Maria admitted:"We all were scared.

“It seems that Krestina checked his pulse.

“I called to the ambulance and police."

Defence lawyers have pressed for the murder allegations to be dropped against all the sisters or mitigated by recategorising the case as causing death by “self defence”.
description: Krestina, Angelina and Maria, were aged 19, 18 and 17 when they killed their 57-year-old dad Mikhail Khachaturyan at their home in Russia
